page.title: 10CHILDREN'S FAVOURITE BOOKS
page.content: There were 1368 children in the area aged seven to eleven years at the time of the survey. 352 of them were asked 1. What is your favourite book? 2. Who is your favourite author? 3. How many books have you read in the last five weeks? Their answers were as follows: 1. The seven year olds had no special favourite. The eight to ten year old groups liked {"The Secret Seven"} and {"Famous Five"} books best. The eleven year age group voted for {"Charlie and th Chocolate Factory"} and{ "Charlotte's Web"}. 2. All age groups liked author {Enid Blyton} best with 39% of the votes. {Roald Dahl} came second with 17% 3. A total of 3989 books had been read in the previous five weeks, an average of eleven books per child.
